spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate with correct room adjacencies. Score deducted for slight inaccuracies in door swing directions (Laundry and Bedroom 2) and window scaling on the bottom facade.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural adherence. All rooms are present, no hallucinations detected. The model is correctly floating on a dark background with no UI or text elements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is consistent with the floor plan, including the U-shaped kitchen and laundry machines. One minor deduction for the living room sofa orientation which differs slightly from the plan's L-shape arrangement.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and neutral background are all present.

detected_errors.description: Laundry door swings inward toward the machines in 3D but outward toward the hall in 2D plan.
Living room sofa configuration changed from two separate seating elements to a single sofa/chair arrangement.
